meanings.definition: To extend over a larger area
meanings.sent1: The paint spreads smoothly on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The wildfire spreads quickly through the forest.
meanings.sent3: As the rumor spreads, it becomes more exaggerated.
meanings.sent4: Her smile spreads warmth to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The virus spreads silently, affecting many people.

meanings.definition: A soft food that is spread on bread or crackers
meanings.sent1: I enjoy peanut butter as a spread on my toast.
meanings.sent2: The cheese spread adds flavor to the crackers.
meanings.sent3: The creamy spread melted on the warm bread.
meanings.sent4: The chocolate spread was a hit at the party.
meanings.sent5: The jam spread was homemade and delicious.

meanings.definition: The difference between two values or rates
meanings.sent1: The spread between the prices was significant.
meanings.sent2: There was a wide spread in the test scores.
meanings.sent3: The spread in temperatures made dressing tricky.
meanings.sent4: The spread in opinions led to a lively debate.
meanings.sent5: The spread in income levels was evident in the neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: She spreads seeds in the garden for new plants.
meanings.sent2: The wind spreads the scent of flowers across the field.
meanings.sent3: He spreads kindness wherever he goes.
meanings.sent4: The news spreads quickly in a small town.
meanings.sent5: The teacher spreads knowledge to eager students.
